name: Make everyday matter
description: Learn new a topic everyday. Read a book while commuting. Watch new video on Youtube. Find a new blog to get inspired. Make your own research. Create something everyday. Contribute to your Github everyday.

name: Do not go to war
description: Resist the temptation of augmenting, making threat and personal attack.

name: Visit or call family
description:
Call a relative, for 5 minutes.
Those are the most important people you know.

name: Calm your emotions
description:
Correct your vision : The other person is not trying to destroy you, he might be in danger.
 Focus on your breathing : focus on yourself.
 Take the shoot : do not react to the other person.

name: Work on your passion
description:
Your passion will change from day-to-day. 
Find a problem in front of you and solve it. Be useful and generous.
Just start doing, do wait.
Your passion follows you.

name: Calm others people emotions
description:
Avoid telling the other to calm down.
Acknowledge what the other is saying, say that you are listening. Show that you want to discuss about it.

name: Understand rather than be understood
description:
Ask question and listen to the answer.
Look to be convince rather to convince.
See with his eyes, feel the way he feels.

name: Exercise
description: Exercising causes the body to make chemicals that can help you to feel good. Exercise can help people sleep better.

name: Find yourself
description: Remember where do you come from, remember what do you love and go for it. Take an hour a day to move closer to your gaols. Don't be afraid to change goals or purposes, life change!

name: Made him understand that you understood
description: Reformulate his thought, ask if ou are right.

name: Are you afraid of change ?
description: "Don't wait until they tell you are ready, get in there quickly. The word may say you are allowed to yet. Allow yourself permission to fail. Do not even bother asking get in there.The word is yours." - Peter Dinklage "Ever tried ever failed no matter fail again fail better." - Samuel Beckett

name: Juxtapose your point of view to his rather than oppose it
description:
Start describing your point of view by starting sentences with "In my point of view", "on the other hand" or "at the same time".
Do not use the word 'but' instead use 'and'.

name: Propose a solution
description: If a win-win solution appears propose it, if not we ask if the other see a solution, may be a compromise could be possible.

name: Volunteer
description:
Find a group of people with a purpose and help them.
It could be in your sport, art organisation...

name: Modify the perception of yourself
description: In life there is no bad or wrong answers. You can learn everything on the internet. One step at the time change little things slowly but truly. You can make it.

name: Eat well
description: Eat fruits and vegetables, cook your own meals. Eat organic.

name: Visualise what you want
description:
You should think advance of the new task you need to carry out. You should have a long-term goal, and divide it into smaller tasks you can do every day.
Be focus once you have started the task give every you get, then review it later.

name: Walk
description: Walk a little more every day. Alight a bus stop before and walk, this will train your body.

name: Take the stairs
description: Power from the legs, get a slice of your legs day every day.
